programme.title: FOX Weather Live
programme.desc: Steve Bender hosts from Studio W, the heart of fox weather, as extreme weather strikes; Steve provides real-time alerts and information to keep you and your family safe and get you ready for the next day ahead.

programme.title: Fox Weather @ Night
programme.desc: Pull an all-nighter with fox weather as our meteorologists recap the day in weather news and forecast across America for tomorrow.

programme.title: FOX Weather First
programme.desc: Wake up at 5am to the first live national forecast of the day; all the latest weather news and everything you need to prepare for the day ahead.
